citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:43 am on
19-Sep-16.
The Iicensee was contacted by phone upon my arrival at his gate . He answered and stated he was out of town .
